item.title: MT-5 West at MTS-511 and MTS-251
item.description: MT-5 West at MTS-511 and MTS-251 in Flaxville.

item.title: MT-5 West Approaching MTS-511 and MTS-251
item.description: MT-5 West approaching MTS-511 and MTS-251. Use MTS-511 north for Flaxville and Whitetail.

item.title: MT-5 West - Port of Big Beaver Status
item.description: MT-5 west approaching MTS-511 and MTS-251 in Flaxville. The Canadian Port of Big Beaver has been permanently closed, along with the US Port of Whitetail. This sign is warning northbound traffic of MTS-511 of the Port of Big Beaver status.

item.title: MT-5 West Approaching MTS-511 and MTS-251
item.description: MT-5 West approaching MTS-511 and MTS-251 in Flaxville.
